forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of freezing rain before 5am, then rain likely and patchy fog. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. Southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and patchy fog before 7am, then rain and widespread fog and a chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 44 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and widespread fog and a chance of thunderstorms before 4am, then a chance of snow. Cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. South southwest wind 3 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 48 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Highly variable, but decent conditions this morning for skate and classic. If you're looking to get out and ski, do it this afternoon; the park has already decided to close for tomorrow. Given how thin the snow coverage is it's doubtful they'll be able to reopen until they spread more snow, and based on past practices, that's unlikely to happen until after New Year . But check anyways in case we get lucky.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open with a classic track. Snow depth is thin and some dirt spots will be encountered.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like calm weather today with a light breeze. The temperature should hover around freezing. The grooming looks very good this morning. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break from 4:30 to 5:30 p.m. to groom for night skiing. The soup of the day is andouille sweet potato. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. Myk Rise will play the Nub's Pub this afternoon. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
